28#include <sys/cdefs.h>
29__KERNEL_RCSID(0, "$NetBSD: intel_modes.c,v 1.2 2018/08/27 04:58:24 riastradh Exp $");
30
31#include <linux/slab.h>
32#include <linux/i2c.h>
33#include <linux/fb.h>
34#include <drm/drm_edid.h>
35#include <drm/drmP.h>
36#include "intel_drv.h"
37#include "i915_drv.h"
38
39/**
40 * intel_connector_update_modes - update connector from edid
41 * @connector: DRM connector device to use
42 * @edid: previously read EDID information
43 */
44int intel_connector_update_modes(struct drm_connector *connector,
45 struct edid *edid)
46{
47 int ret;
48
49 drm_mode_connector_update_edid_property(connector, edid);
50 ret = drm_add_edid_modes(connector, edid);
51 drm_edid_to_eld(connector, edid);
52
53 return ret;
54}
55
56/**
57 * intel_ddc_get_modes - get modelist from monitor
58 * @connector: DRM connector device to use
59 * @adapter: i2c adapter
60 *
61 * Fetch the EDID information from @connector using the DDC bus.
62 */
63int intel_ddc_get_modes(struct drm_connector *connector,
64 struct i2c_adapter *adapter)
65{
66 struct edid *edid;
67 int ret;
68
69 edid = drm_get_edid(connector, adapter);
70 if (!edid)
71 return 0;
72
73 ret = intel_connector_update_modes(connector, edid);
74 kfree(edid);
75
76 return ret;
77}
78
79static const struct drm_prop_enum_list force_audio_names[] = {
80 { HDMI_AUDIO_OFF_DVI, "force-dvi" },
81 { HDMI_AUDIO_OFF, "off" },
82 { HDMI_AUDIO_AUTO, "auto" },
83 { HDMI_AUDIO_ON, "on" },
84};
85
86void
87intel_attach_force_audio_property(struct drm_connector *connector)
88{
89 struct drm_device *dev = connector->dev;
90 struct drm_i915_private *dev_priv = dev->dev_private;
91 struct drm_property *prop;
92
93 prop = dev_priv->force_audio_property;
94 if (prop == NULL) {
95 prop = drm_property_create_enum(dev, 0,
96 "audio",
97 force_audio_names,
98 ARRAY_SIZE(force_audio_names));
99 if (prop == NULL)
100 return;
101
102 dev_priv->force_audio_property = prop;
103 }
104 drm_object_attach_property(&connector->base, prop, 0);
105}
106
107static const struct drm_prop_enum_list broadcast_rgb_names[] = {
108 { INTEL_BROADCAST_RGB_AUTO, "Automatic" },
109 { INTEL_BROADCAST_RGB_FULL, "Full" },
110 { INTEL_BROADCAST_RGB_LIMITED, "Limited 16:235" },
111};
112
113void
114intel_attach_broadcast_rgb_property(struct drm_connector *connector)
115{
116 struct drm_device *dev = connector->dev;
117 struct drm_i915_private *dev_priv = dev->dev_private;
118 struct drm_property *prop;
119
120 prop = dev_priv->broadcast_rgb_property;
121 if (prop == NULL) {
122 prop = drm_property_create_enum(dev, DRM_MODE_PROP_ENUM,
123 "Broadcast RGB",
124 broadcast_rgb_names,
125 ARRAY_SIZE(broadcast_rgb_names));
126 if (prop == NULL)
127 return;
128
129 dev_priv->broadcast_rgb_property = prop;
130 }
131
132 drm_object_attach_property(&connector->base, prop, 0);
133}
134
135void
136intel_attach_aspect_ratio_property(struct drm_connector *connector)
137{
138 if (!drm_mode_create_aspect_ratio_property(connector->dev))
139 drm_object_attach_property(&connector->base,
140 connector->dev->mode_config.aspect_ratio_property,
141 DRM_MODE_PICTURE_ASPECT_NONE);
142}
